global_variables.creator_name: DIVISION FOR OBSERVATION QUALITY AND DATA PROCESSING
global_variables.publisher_name: DIVISION FOR OBSERVATION QUALITY AND DATA PROCESSING
global_variables.title: Direct Broadcast data processed in satellite swath to L1C.
global_variables.summary: Direct Broadcast data received at MET NORWAY Oslo. Processed by standard processing software to geolocated and calibrated values in satellite swath in received instrument resolution. This contains the M-Bands.
global_variables.keywords: GCMDSK:Earth Science > Atmosphere > Atmospheric radiation, GEMET:Meteorological geographical features, GEMET:Atmospheric conditions, GEMET:Oceanographic geographical features, NORTHEMES:Weather and climate
global_variables.NCO: netCDF Operators version 5.0.6 (Homepage = http://nco.sf.net, Code = http://github.com/nco/nco)
